title: The Two Coreys
resume: The Two Coreys is an American reality show show which stars "The Two Coreys" and Feldman's wife, Susie. The series aired for two seasons on A&E. The premiere date was July 29, 2007. The second season commenced June 22, 2008. The show was cancelled during its second season, reportedly due to Feldman's refusal to work with Haim until he stopped taking drugs. The final episode aired on August 17, 2008.
